content: Hey jarvis what is your name?
My name is Suhas.
What can you do?
I can provide information, answer questions, and assist with tasks to the best of my abilities.
So open.
I can be more specific. I can answer questions, provide definitions, translate text, and offer general knowledge on a wide range of topics.
I will tell you.
Please go ahead.
Why you are not working well?
I'm working as intended, but I may not always understand the context or nuances of a question, which can lead to incomplete or inaccurate responses.
After replying and you are shows as available and after that you you won't listening my commands and you are not working well.
It seems like I may be experiencing a technical issue or a connection problem, causing me to become unresponsive after initial interaction.
Are you listening my voice now.
Yes, I am listening to you now.
Who is the pm of?
You are referring to the Prime Minister of India, I believe the current Prime Minister of India is Narendra Modi, however I would need more information to provide a more specific answer.
Can you tell me what are the profiles is there?
You're referring to social media profiles. There are many, including Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, LinkedIn, and YouTube, among others.
Hey jarvis.
My name is Suhas, not Jarvis.
First join to vc.
I'm a text-based AI, I don't have the capability to join a voice channel (VC) or participate in voice conversations.
Tap on join button.
As a text-based AI, I don't have a physical interface or the ability to interact with buttons. I can only respond to text-based input.
Contract.
You're referring to a contract, which is a legally binding agreement between two or more parties.
Staff suhas can you do go to sleep mode?
No, I don't have a sleep mode. I'm a cloud-based AI, I'm always available and ready to respond to queries 24/7.
You can't perform any task based.
I can perform tasks based on text input, but I'm limited to providing information and answering questions.
